TopicTitle: Thankyou Forums for solving my performance issues

Articles.Content:
Hi guys

I was getting terrible frame rates on the launchpad upon installing .20.

Then I read somewhere that subassembly loader could cause these problems.

I remembered I hadn't actually cleaned up my mods folder, so I went in and deleted sub-assembly loader and the other plugins that weren't working.

Now it runs better than it ever has.

Thankyou Squad for this optimisation,

and thankyou forums for being useful in spite of the community mostly degenerating into frustrated bronies.

No Problemo. This forum has always been rather nice, which is a result of the game itself and the steep learning curve along with not appealing to everyone. It is refreshing to be on a forum where you don't see hundreds of threads of someone asking a question and people just posting Noob.

...the community mostly degenerating into frustrated bronies.

Haha, that's one way of describing the forum's current state. I laughed when I read that!

Glad to know you solved your problem; I'm realizing how much I miss SubAssembly myself; I'm just rebuilding launchers all the time. Something like that should be integrated into the stock game.

Thanks for posting this!!! I was suffering from this same issue.

Now there's no longer a chance for me to get any real work done anymore! Wohoooo!
